name: CubeUp
description:
*Early access platformer game*

More features and levels coming soon!

CubeUp is a simple platformer based on jumping onto platforms and testing your ability to time and maximize your jumps! You'll have to adapt to doing quick reactions with powers ups and different types of platforms. Navigate your way through different types of challenges and levels to reach the top. If you do well you can even jump your name onto the highscores!

Coming Soon:

New level themes!

New types of platforms!

New powerups!

More animations!

Credits: Enzo Suarez for music themes for the game 

zapsplat for sound effects

This is my first project!, Please give feedback and suggest improvements!

**How to play**

Download CubeUp.zip

Extract all files

Open CubeUpFiles folder

Run CubeUp.exe

Contact me if there are any issues!
